channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: #BREAKING NEWS: Special counse
item.description: #BREAKING NEWS: Special counsel Jack Smith has charged former President Donald Trump in a superseding indictment in his federal election interference case.

item.title: Several states have been in le
item.description: Several states have been in legal fights for months to determine the rules and regulations for the 2024 election. Here's a look at the battles playing out in Georgia, Arizona and Nevada.

item.title: Last year was the deadliest on
item.description: Last year was the deadliest on record for heat-related deaths in Arizona. Nearly 1,000 people died, according to recent data shared by Arizona health officials.
